beak.methods.som.nextsomcore.loadfile module

Created on Fri Jul 5 14:10:46 2019

Script that servers as launch point to loading geotiff, csv or lrn files. Possibly more filetypes in the future

@author: shautala

Modyfied by Ina Storch, 2024

beak.methods.som.nextsomcore.loadfile.load_input_file(input_file, label_file='')[source]

load input file of type lrn, csv or geotiff

Parameters:

  • input_file (LiteralString) – input file paths, separated by komma

  • label_file (LiteralString, optional) – label file paths. Defaults to “”.

Returns:

dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.nextsomcore.loadfile.read_coordinate_columns(header)[source]

read coordinate columns for file types lrn, csv and geotiff

Parameters:

header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Returns:

dictionary holding x and y coordinates as a column stack (ndarray), coordinates of rows with no data values that are skipped in load_input_file(), column names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.nextsomcore.loadfile.read_data_columns(header)[source]

read data columns for file types lrn, csv and geotiff

Parameters:

header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Returns:

dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and column (data) names

Return type:

dict
